item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Lindolfo Rodrigues, a.k.a Lorn. I have the following curiosities: Music Computer Books In each one of this categories there’s a ton of stufff my work history I started working as a System Administrator in 2001 and moved to a Web System Administrator in 2004; after developing tools to automate a lot of processes, I started moving to a Software Engineer role in 2006, and since then, I have been doing Backend development and infrastructure development using many languages professionally throughout the years.
